metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7729 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The package grunt before 1.3.0 are vulnerable to Arbitrary Code Execution due to the default usage of the function load() instead of its secure replacement safeLoad() of the package js-yaml inside grunt.file.readYAML.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-7729` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

grunt - 1.0.1-8ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: grunt package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-8ubuntu0.1').
